name: Lisa
line: When did you even manage to do all of this.

name: Marcus
line: Lets say I have my own ways...

name: Marcus
line: Dont think about it. Lets focus on important staff.

name: Lisa
line: All of my clothes is ruined!

name: Marcus
line: I'll explain everything on the way to a shop.

name: Lisa
line: Whatever. I just don't wanna see all this.
